synopsis.text: After a long and bloody war, humanity has reluctantly accepted peace with the invading Mechanical race in order to survive. Captain Warrius Zero, who lost his family during the war, now serves the victorious Mechanicals. He receives an unexpected mission - to hunt down the notorious space pirate Captain Harlock, who continues to fight against Mechanical oppression. Zero is assigned an experimental ship with a crew comprised of both humans and Mechanicals. As he pursues the elusive Harlock to the edges of the universe, Zero grapples with the complexities of this uneasy alliance. Strange events transpire that make him question the true motivations behind his mission. Is there more to this pursuit than he realizes? The convictions and ideals of both men will be tested as their destinies collide among the stars.
